This bug was replicated by myself, Kevin and I think Dave Mcknight when I first opened it.  Unfortunately none of us are able to replicate it at the moment, including Xuan Chen.
So that's a candidate for WORKSFORME / 2.0RC4, isn't it? Or would we like to investigate the cause of this sine nothing changed in that area?
I tried again today and can't reproduce this.  I'm going to mark it worksforme.
